sect1.title: Mktemp-&mktemp-version;
sect1.para: The Mktemp package contains programs used to create secure temporary files in shell scripts.
The installation dependencies for Mktemp haven't been checked yet.

sect2.title: Installation of Mktemp
sect2.para: Many scripts still use the deprecated tempfile program, which has functionality much the same as mktemp. Patch mktemp to include a tempfile wrapper:
The meaning of the configure option:

listitem.para: --with-libc: This causes the mktemp program to use the mkstemp and mkdtemp functions from the system C library.

sect2.title: Short descriptions
sect2.para: mktemp creates temporary files in a secure manner. It is used in scripts.
tempfile creates temporary files in a less secure manner than mktemp. It is installed for backwards-compatibility.
